title.value: Immunization Evaluation Dose Status Reason codes

description.value: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why an administered dose has been assigned a particular status. Often, this reason describes why a dose is considered invalid. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.
